mixed-citation.article-title: First records and two new species of sipunculans (Sipuncula) from the Southern Mexican Pacific

tp:treatment-sec.p:
74–76, as
Sipunculus strombus
; type locality: S coast of Devonshire, UK . — Dean 2001: 87 (Gulf of Nicoya, 18 m , muddy sand, in an empty gastropod shell). Questionable record in the TEP.
